project.name: HanuCoin
project.description: A Community-Driven Digital Asset Built on Binance Smart Chain
project.tagline: HanuCoin is a decentralized community-focused project designed to promote transparency, participation, and long-term growth.

about.description: HanuCoin is a decentralized digital token created to support a transparent and community-driven ecosystem. The project focuses on simplicity, trust, and sustainable growth.
about.mission: Our mission is to build a trustworthy, community-powered ecosystem where users can grow, learn, and collaborate in a transparent environment.

features.title: Community-focused development
features.description: Our community drives decisions and project direction through transparent voting and feedback mechanisms.

features.title: Transparent structure
features.description: All transactions and project developments are open for community verification and audit.

features.title: Long-term vision
features.description: Focused on sustainable growth and utility rather than short-term hype and speculation.

features.title: Simple and secure design
features.description: Built on Binance Smart Chain with security and user-friendliness as core principles.

features.title: No false promises
features.description: We believe in realistic goals and transparent communication with our community.

legal.disclaimer: HanuCoin is a community-driven project and does not offer financial advice. Always do your own research. Cryptocurrency investments are subject to market risks. The value of investments can go up or down.
